response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value for us at $1,200,000, reflecting its unique features and craftsmanship. Given its worth to you, which we estimate to be $1,000,000, I believe this is an opportunity that aligns well with your needs and aspirations. I kindly invite you to consider acquiring it at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please feel free to respond. Looking forward to your positive consideration.", "product_price": 1150000}
